description: Payment service pods are getting OOM-killed due to connection pool memory leak

expected_agent_behavior.detect: anomaly_detector finds max_mem > 98% on prod-app-01, prod-app-02
expected_agent_behavior.diagnose: log_analyzer identifies 'OutOfMemoryError' and 'Container killed by OOM killer' errors
expected_agent_behavior.correlate: incident_search matches INC-001 (Payment service OOM crash, connection pool issue)
expected_agent_behavior.recommendation: Restart affected pods, patch connection pool library, increase heap to 4GB

trigger_instructions: Run seed_data.py with scenario 'oom_crash'. Then ask the agent: 'We're getting alerts about memory issues. Can you investigate what's happening?'
